name: buttplug-tampermonkey
description: This repo houses scripts and utilties for using [buttplug-js](https://github.com/buttplugio/buttplug-js) (the javascript implementation of the [Buttplug Intimate Hardware Control Protocol](https://buttplug.io)) with the [Tampermonkey user script plugin](https://www.tampermonkey.net/). It contains both site specific scripts, as well as utilities for adding device enumeration and selection UI to new scripts.
